overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "How I Got The Story" — Beau Matthews interviews Michael Christopher, who gives Beau everything he has and Beau gets his big piece!  "Double Deal" — Jeff Wells and Mike DeMarco meet each other at a gym, then go home to fantasize about each other showing off and they jerk off to the images in their mind.  "Photo Play" — Photographer Quinn Curtis goes in for some close-up touchy-feely action with model Adam Stuart.
title: How I Got the Story
